meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Western style</kanji> <kanji>clothes</kanji> is just <vocabulary>Western clothing</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>Western style clothes</vocabulary>). But nowadays, because Japanese people wear Western clothing all the time, we use it to just mean <vocabulary>clothes</vocabulary>. We're talking things that aren't kimonos, etc.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
